article.title: Assessing the progress of trapped-ion processors towards fault-tolerant quantum computation

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the purpose of the 88Sr+ ions (green dots) in the proposed trapped-ion QEC platform?
choices: To serve as data qubits for encoding quantum information.
To reduce the number of phonons prior to entangling gates through sympathetic cooling.
To extract syndrome information by mixed-species readout.

multiple_choice_question.text: In the protocol depicted, who is responsible for the imperfect application of the QEC cycle?
What is the logical distance of the 7-qubit color code shown?
How does an X-type error on the control qubit of a CNOT gate propagate to the target qubit?
choices: It propagates as an X-type error on the target qubit.
It propagates as a Z-type error on the target qubit.
It does not propagate to the target qubit.
It creates a Y-type error on both the control and target qubits.

multiple_choice_question.text: What effect does an increasing mean phonon number (nÌ„f) have on the gate time of a fully-entangling MS gate?
choices: It has no effect on the gate time.
The effect depends on the specific type of MS gate.
